https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9rSJaSUEQbiMEcr9zNWo0SQPUEK.jpg Set within an animal shelter, where if the owner of an animal doesn't claim their pet in 7 days, the animal is put to sleep. Himawari, is a female dog and a mother. She tries to desperately save her baby dogs. 7 Days of Himawari & Her Puppies
